## DefaultApp.registerStore() method

API for developers to register [AppStores](./foundation-shell.appstore.md) lazily.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerStore(store: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  store | any | The [AppStore](./foundation-shell.appstore.md) to register. |
